Fig. 4 Silhouette scores per epoch for best run (by Silhouette score) of Lac and Lesc. A comparison of the
Silhouette scores for each epoch for the best run (as determined by Silhouette score) for Lp (0.92) and

Lesc (0.7) A For Lec the Silhouette score rises in a steep and linear fashion due to the heavy influence of the
clustering loss Lc. B Lpsc shows an upward trend, albeit with more fluctuations due to the heavy weight of the
survival-based L, loss compared to the clustering-based L-
